channel.title: BUpolitics

item.title: Getting Cheated in a Videogame Led Him to a World of Online Crime
item.description: At 16, Ricky Handschumacher was a high-school baseball star. A decade later, he was facing federal prison for stealing cryptocurrency.

item.title: For Jimmy Carter, faith was inseparable from politics and life
item.description: Carter talked openly and often in the 1976 campaign about his evangelical “born again” faith, ignoring those who advised him to downplay his beliefs.
